content.rendered:
The god of thunder embarks on an unprecedented journey: he searches for inner peace. His retirement from superheroing is short-lived, however, as the galactic assassin Gorr the Godslayer sets out to wipe out the gods. For the fight ahead, Thor enlists the help of the Valkyrie king Korg and his ex-girlfriend Jane Foster, who – to Thor’s greatest surprise – can use the magical hammer Mjölnir. Together, they embark on a cosmic adventure that tests man and god to find out the mysterious reason for the Godslayer’s revenge and stop him before it is too late.

Directed By Taika Waititi

Written By Taika Waititi. Jennifer Kaytin Robinson. Stan Lee

Stars: Chris Hemsworth. Natalie Portman. Christian Bale
